snippet.title: Polymega Gameplays - Motocross Mania 2 [PlayStation]
snippet.description:
Motocross Mania 2 is a motorcycle racing game for 1 or 2 players. The game contains an arcade mode (race and time attack practice), a career mode with three difficulty levels, and a track editor. Apart from winning races, the player may perform a variety of tricks. The game allows to choose the gender of the racer, and features five motorbikes and twelve race tracks. The player has the ability to change the specs of their motorcycle, such as suspension, exhaust or brakes. The gameplay is typical of arcade racing games, with a motorbike that can't be damaged although the player may fall down.

The game features a multiplayer mode on a split screen - horizontal or vertical.

Motocross Mania 2 (C) Take Two Interactive
Developed by Alpine Studios
BIOS Used: Polymega BIOS
